name: Kill the Germs! (itch)
description:
Kill the germs is still in early access(beta)! Here are the version details-

V0.0.01 (Beta)

-Fixed a bug where if you got a key, the exit is blocked

-Added Weapon AR15 Drum Gun

-Added Weapon Revolver

-Added weapon Grenade

-Released Kill the germs

How to play -

1.Extract the zip file to a specified folder

2.Run the exe file

3. no step 3! just play and chill!
